column4: SEC charges two with Cheniere insider trading
column5: NEW YORK The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday charged two men with insider trading in natural gas company Cheniere Energy Inc in 2011 and 2012.

column4: U.S. SEC charges two with Cheniere insider trading
column5: NEW YORK  Oct 9 The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday charged two men with insider trading in natural gas company Cheniere Energy Inc in 2011 and 2012.
